title: Log in to Basic Auth Website
main_flow: The user navigates to the Basic Auth website at https://the-internet.herokuapp.com/basic_auth.
The user verifies that the website is asking for sign-in credentials.
The user enters the username "admin" into the Username field.
4. The user enters the password "admin" into the Password field.
5. The user clicks the Sign in button.
postconditions: The user is successfully logged in and sees the Basic Auth and Congratulations headers on the webpage.
